body_html: For my taste, some_func(x.unsqueeze(-1, -1)).squeeze(-1, -1) is more readable than some_func(x[..., None, None]).squeeze(-1).squeeze(-1) (since symmetry is clear), but of course it's mainly a question of taste
body_text: For my taste, some_func(x.unsqueeze(-1, -1)).squeeze(-1, -1) is more readable than some_func(x[..., None, None]).squeeze(-1).squeeze(-1) (since symmetry is clear), but of course it's mainly a question of taste
body: For my taste, `some_func(x.unsqueeze(-1, -1)).squeeze(-1, -1)` is more readable than `some_func(x[..., None, None]).squeeze(-1).squeeze(-1)` (since symmetry is clear), but of course it's mainly a question of taste
